pullRequest.body:
Forward-port of leanprover-community/mathlib#19101
Motivated by https://github.com/Shamrock-Frost/BrouwerFixedPoint

Co-authored-by: @Shamrock-Frost

---

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they

nodes.body: Thank you so much for working on this Yury!

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7830377641/job/21364266854)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7830377641/job/21364265835)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7830377641/job/21364266609)

Maybe
```suggestion
lemma stdSimplex_of_isEmpty_index [IsEmpty ι] [Nontrivial 𝕜] : stdSimplex 𝕜 ι = ∅ :=
```
Or something to distinguish it from the lemma above

```suggestion
theorem ite_eq_mem_stdSimplex (i : ι) : (fun j => if i = j then (1 : 𝕜) else 0) ∈ stdSimplex 𝕜 ι := by
```

Can you add the more general
```suggestion
def stdSimplexEquivIcc : stdSimplex 𝕜 (Fin (n + 1)) ≃ stdSimplex 𝕜 (Fin n) × Icc (0 : 𝕜) 1 where
```
Ah, I guess that's not quite true

I think the true version is
```suggestion
def stdSimplexEquivIcc : stdSimplex 𝕜 (Fin 2) ≃ Σ c : Icc (0 : 𝕜) 1, c • stdSimplex 𝕜 (Fin n) where
```
but it seems inconvenient to use

Perhaps
```suggestion
@[simps]
def stdSimplexHomeomorphUnitInterval : stdSimplex ℝ (Fin 2) ≃ₜ unitInterval where
```

```suggestion
/-- the edges are contained in the simplex -/
lemma segment_single_subset_stdSimplex (i j : ι) : [Pi.single i 1 -[𝕜] Pi.single j 1] ⊆ stdSimplex 𝕜 ι :=
```

```suggestion
lemma segment_single_subset_stdSimplex (i j : ι) :
    [Pi.single i 1 -[𝕜] Pi.single j 1] ⊆ stdSimplex 𝕜 ι :=
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Analysis/Convex): lemmas about low-dimensional `stdSimplex`es

source.title: feat(analysic/convex): add lemmas and defs about low-dimensional simplices
